item.title: Version 1.1.2
item.description:
• Added additional URL validation
  • Added support for Sketch plugin updater

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
• Now it should save your Sheets URL specific to each document
  • Added support for symbols in Sketch 48
  • Now you can use image URLs (even for symbols)
  • Added ability to randomise the item number/li>
